Responsabilidades:
Desenvolver e implementar modelos de Machine Learning utilizando GCP 
Utilizar bibliotecas de Python, como Scikit-learn, TensorFlow e Pandas, para o desenvolvimento de solu√ß√µes

[Oportunidade 2]
Oportunidade: Data Scientist SR

Sobre a vaga
Description

Important Information 
Location: Brazil
 Job Mode: CLT 
Work Mode: Work from home

Job Summary
We seek a talented and motivated Data Scientist to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in artificial intelligence, specifically in generative AI for image generation, deep learning for computer vision, and image processing. You will be responsible for developing and deploying AI applications using Azure AI Studio to enhance our product offerings.

Responsibilities and Duties
Develop and implement AI/ML models and applications for image generation tasks;
Utilize Azure AI Studio to deploy, scale, and maintain AI models and applications;
Conduct data analysis to extract meaningful insights and guide decision-making processes;
Stay updated with the latest advancements in AI, image generation and computer vision to drive continuous innovation;
Write and maintain clear, concise documentation for developed models and systems;
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI solutions into our products.

Essential Skills
Proven experience in using generative AI models for image generation;
Strong understanding of computer vision principles and applications;
Proficiency in Python and common AI/ML frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch);
Hands-on experience with Azure technologies preferably Azure AI Studio;
Solid understanding of data preprocessing, analysis, and visualization techniques.

About Encora

Encora is the preferred digital engineering and modernization partner of some of the world‚Äôs leading enterprises and digital native companies. With over 9,000 experts in 47+ offices and innovation labs worldwide, Encora‚Äôs technology practices include Product Engineering & Development, Cloud Services, Quality Engineering, DevSecOps, Data & Analytics, Digital Experience, Cybersecurity, and AI & LLM Engineering.

At Encora, we hire professionals based solely on their skills and qualifications, and do not discriminate based on age, disability, religion, gender, sexual orientation, socioeconomic status, or nationality.

Oportunidade: Senior Data Engineer

Sobre a vaga
Senior Data Engineer 
Andela 
Location Requirement: Brazil, Canada, Egypt. 
 About Andela 
Andela exists to connect brilliance and opportunity. For technologists, Andela offers competitive long-term career opportunities with leading organizations, access to a global community of professionals, and educational opportunities with leading technology providers.

-- 100% payment in USD. 
 This is a fully remote opportunity for one of our esteemed clients.  
 About the role 
 Responsibilities: 
Developing pipelines to ingest data across multiple security products and delivering this data for use in Cisco‚Äôs XDR product. 
Using AWS services to deliver, process, and transform data 
Managing and monitoring application health and status across testing and production systems to ensure stability, high availability, and consistent delivery of data for the product 
Collaborating with other engineers to review code changes, communicate progress, and finalize system requirements 
Testing new features using unit tests, manual verification, and supporting end-to-end integration tests 
Building and maintaining data access layers to control access to sensitive data 
The role is a 70/30 split between Data Engineering and Data Architecture respectivel 
 Must have requirements: 
Data Engineering 
Python including libs e.g. pandas 
AWS services e.g., Lambda, Redshift, RDS, S3 (nice to have services include: CloudWatch, Aurora, Kinesis, Firehose, SQS, SNS, IAM) 
Terraform to help manage AWS serverless resources 
Strong Data Architecture experience 
Strong Communication & Stakeholder Management Skills 
Self-directed & Autonomous 
 Nice to have requirements: 
Project tracking management software (e.g., Jira, GitHub) 
CI/CD - control and continuous integration tools e.g., Jenkins, TeamCity, GitHub 
Performance monitoring & error tracking solutions 
Testing software code (e.g., manually testing functionality, writing automated unit tests, automating end-to-end tests) 
Support

Data Engineering (7 - 9 yrs) 
Python (4 - 6 yrs) 
AWS (Amazon Web Services) (4 - 6 yrs)

 Optional skills 
Jira (Atlassian) (4 - 6 yrs) 
Jenkins (4 - 6 yrs)

Time zone overlap requirements: Fully overlap hours with EST (9 am - 5 pm) 
Location Requirements: Brazil, Canada, Egypt.

Estimated Duration: 11-month-term contractor position (Renewable) 
Full-time dedication (40 hours/week)
